column3: Group code
column4: Class code
column5: Whether or not detailed requirements are provided

column2: Including chandelier, stand, bracket, down light, spot light, pendant light, ceiling light, wall light, etc.

column3: Contents of property
column4: Value range(decimal notation)

column3: This property indicates the ON/OFF status.
column4: ON=0x30, OFF=0x31

column3: This property indicates illuminance level in %.
This property indicates the color setting.
column4: Incandescent lamp color = 0x41, white = 0x42, daylight white = 0x43, daylight color = 0x44, other = 0x40

column3: Used to specify the illuminance level in terms of steps and acquire the current setting.
column4: From 0x01 to the maximum specifiable illuminance level value (from dark to bright)

column3: Used to specify the light color in terms of steps and acquire the current setting.
column4: From 0x01 to the maximum specifiable light color value (from incandescent lamp color to white)

column3: Used to acquire the maximum specifiable illuminance level value and the maximum specifiable light color value.
column4: First byte: illuminance  Second byte: light color 0x01.0xFF (Step 1.Step 255) 0x00 (when the function is not implemented)

column2: Maximum value of settable level for night lighting
column3: Used to acquire the maximum values of illuminance and light color settable levels for night lighting.
column4: First byte: illuminance Second byte: light color 0x01–0xFF (Step 1–Step 255) 0x00 (when the function is not implemented)

column3: Auto/main lighting/night lighting/color lighting
column4: Auto=0x41, main lighting=0x42, night lighting=0x43, color lighting=0x45

column2: Illuminance level setting for main lighting
column3: Indicates the illuminance level of main lighting in %.

column2: Illuminance level step setting for main lighting
column3: Used to set the illuminance level by the number of steps for main lighting and to acquire the current setting.
column4: 0x01 to the maximum value of settable illuminance level(dark to bright)

column2: Illuminance level setting for night lighting
column3: Indicates the illuminance level of night lighting in %.

column2: Illuminance level step setting for night lighting
column3: Used to set the illuminance level by the number of steps for night lighting and to acquire the current setting status.
column4: 0x01 to the maximum value of settable illuminance level (dark to bright)

column2: Light color setting for main lighting
column3: Used to set the light color for main lighting.
column4: Incandescent lamp color=0x41, white= 0x42, daylight white=0x43, daylight color= 0x44, other=0x40

column2: Light color level step setting for main lighting
column3: Used to set the light color level by the number of steps for main lighting and to acquire the current setting.
column4: 0x01to the maximum value of settable light color level (incandescent lamp color to white)

column2: Light color setting for night lighting
column3: Used to set the light color for night lighting.
column4: incandescent lamp color=0x41, white=0x42, daylight white=0x43, daylight color=0x44

column2: Light color level step setting for night lighting
column3: Used to set the light color level by the number of steps for night lighting and to acquire the current setting.
column4: 0x01 to the maximum value of settable light color level (incandescent lamp color to white)

column2: Lighting mode status in auto mode
column3: Used to acquire the current lighting mode in auto mode.
column4: main lighting=0x42, night lighting=0x43, off=0x44, color lighting=0x45

column3: Used to set the RGB value for color lighting and to acquire the current setting.
column4: Byte 1: R Byte 2: G Byte 3: B 0x00–0xFF (0–255) Minimum brightness=0x00,maximum brightness=0xFF

column3: Reservation ON/OFF
column4: Reservation ON=0x41, Reservation OFF=0x42

column3: Timer value HH:MM
Reservation ON/OFF
column4: Reservation ON=0x41, Reservation OFF=0x42

column3: Timer value HH:MM
